[Wand of Crackling Lightning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=754)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 265 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wand is made of two copper plates separated by a ceramic center.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), but the spell's area is twice as wide (two adjacent and parallel 120-foot lines) and creatures that fail their save are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) for 1 round.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _lightning bolt_ of the appropriate level.
